data.lyric:
[ti:good 4 u (Explicit)]
[ar:Olivia Rodrigo]
[al:good 4 u (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.31]good 4 u (Explicit) - Olivia Rodrigo
[00:01.49]Lyrics by：Daniel Nigro/Olivia Rodrigo
[00:02.66]Composed by：Daniel Nigro/Olivia Rodrigo
[00:03.87]
[00:06.57]Well good for you I guess you moved on really easily
[00:09.44]You found a new girl and it only took a couple weeks
[00:12.19]Remember when you said that you wanted to give me the world
[00:17.07]
[00:17.76]And good for you I guess that you've been working on yourself
[00:20.71]I guess that therapist I found for you she really helped
[00:23.62]Now you can be a better man for your brand new girl
[00:27.79]
[00:29.63]Well good for you
[00:30.87]You look happy and healthy not me
[00:33.41]If you ever cared to ask
[00:35.50]Good for you
[00:36.55]You're doing great out there without me baby
[00:39.15]God I wish that I could do that
[00:41.13]I've lost my mind
[00:42.41]I've spent the night
[00:43.79]Crying on the floor of my bathroom
[00:46.84]But you're so unaffected I really don't get it
[00:49.81]But I guess good for you
[00:53.10]
[00:58.33]Well good for you I guess you're getting everything you want
[01:00.95]You bought a new car and your career's really taking off
[01:03.94]It's like we never even happened baby
[01:05.73]What the f**k is up with that
[01:08.29]
[01:09.50]And good for you it's like you never even met me
[01:12.26]Remember when you swore to God I was the only
[01:15.02]Person who ever got you
[01:16.29]Well screw that and screw you
[01:17.90]You will never have to hurt the way you know that I do
[01:20.71]
[01:21.25]Well good for you
[01:22.44]You look happy and healthy not me
[01:24.91]If you ever cared to ask
[01:27.12]Good for you
[01:28.06]You're doing great out there without me baby
[01:30.67]God I wish that I could do that
[01:32.72]I've lost my mind
[01:34.01]I've spent the night
[01:35.44]Crying on the floor of my bathroom
[01:38.40]But you're so unaffected I really don't get it
[01:41.58]But I guess good for you
[01:44.61]
[02:01.36]Maybe I'm too emotional
[02:03.89]But your apathy's like a wound in salt
[02:06.95]Maybe I'm too emotional
[02:09.75]Or maybe you never cared at all
[02:12.78]Maybe I'm too emotional
[02:15.34]Your apathy's like a wound in salt
[02:18.50]Maybe I'm too emotional
[02:21.25]Or maybe you never cared at all
[02:25.31]Well good for you
[02:25.98]You look happy and healthy not me
[02:28.60]If you ever cared to ask
[02:30.69]Good for you
[02:31.76]You're doing great out there without me baby
[02:34.36]Like a d**n sociopath
[02:36.46]I've lost my mind
[02:37.61]I've spent the night
[02:39.08]Crying on the floor of my bathroom
[02:42.10]But you're so unaffected I really don't get it
[02:45.31]But I guess good for you
[02:48.16]
[02:53.48]Well good for you I guess you moved on really easily
data.trans:
[ti:good 4 u (Explicit)]
[ar:Olivia Rodrigo]
[al:good 4 u (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.31]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.49]//
[00:02.66]//
[00:03.87]
[00:06.57]真有你的 你如此轻易地就能放下往事
[00:09.44]数周过去 新欢就已陪伴你旁
[00:12.19]还记得你曾许诺给我全世界
[00:17.07]
[00:17.76]真有你的 我想你一直都在为自己着想
[00:20.71]我猜我给你找的医生 她真的能帮到你
[00:23.62]现在你能为新欢蜕变成更好的人
[00:27.79]
[00:29.63]真有你的
[00:30.87]你看起来健康快乐 而我不似这般
[00:33.41]若你还关心我的话
[00:35.50]真有你的
[00:36.55]宝贝你没有了我 你也能活得逍遥自在 
[00:39.15]天哪我也希望我能像你这般
[00:41.13]我已失去理智
[00:42.41]我整夜瘫坐在浴室的地板上
[00:43.79]独自淌泪
[00:46.84]但是你却无动于衷 我真的不明白
[00:49.81]但是我想 真有你的
[00:53.10]
[00:58.33]真有你的 我猜你已实现你的所有愿望
[01:00.95]购置新车 事业正式起飞
[01:03.94]宝贝 这就像是我们未曾在一起过
[01:05.73]究竟是怎么一回事
[01:08.29]
[01:09.50]真有你的 你表现得像是我们素不相识那般
[01:12.26]我仍记得你向上天发誓我是你的此生唯一
[01:15.02]唯一懂你的人
[01:16.29]去他的誓言去你的
[01:17.90]你永远都体会不到我的伤痛
[01:20.71]
[01:21.25]真有你的
[01:22.44]你看起来健康快乐 而我不似这般
[01:24.91]若你还关心我的话
[01:27.12]真有你的
[01:28.06]宝贝你没有了我 你也能活得逍遥自在 
[01:30.67]天哪我也希望我能像你这般
[01:32.72]我已失去理智
[01:34.01]我整夜瘫坐在浴室的地板上
[01:35.44]独自淌泪
[01:38.40]但是你却无动于衷 我真的不明白
[01:41.58]但是我想 真有你的
[01:44.61]
[02:01.36]或许是我太情绪化
[02:03.89]但你对我冷漠 就如同在我伤口上撒盐
[02:06.95]或许是我太情绪化
[02:09.75]或许你就不屑一顾
[02:12.78]或许是我太情绪化
[02:15.34]对我表现出的冷漠 就如同在我伤口上撒盐
[02:18.50]或许是我太情绪化
[02:21.25]或许你就不屑一顾
[02:25.31]真有你的
[02:25.98]你看起来健康快乐 而我不似这般
[02:28.60]若你还关心我的话
[02:30.69]真有你的
[02:31.76]宝贝你没有了我 你也能活得逍遥自在 
[02:34.36]我就像个反社会者
[02:36.46]我已失去理智
[02:37.61]我整夜瘫坐在浴室的地板上
[02:39.08]独自淌泪
[02:42.10]但是你却无动于衷 我真的不明白
[02:45.31]但是我想 真有你的
[02:48.16]
[02:53.48]真有你的 你如此轻易地就能放下往事
